text: The House of Stewart, or Stuart, is a royal house of Scotland and England. The Tudor dynasty ended when Queen Elizabeth I died in 1603. She named her cousin James I as heir. He became James I of England, and started the Stuart dynasty. ==List of monarchs== Here are the rulers of the Stuart dynasty: ===Scotland=== Portrait Name From Until Relationship with predecessor align="center" align="center" align="center" align="center" align="center" align="center" align="center" align="center" ===Great Britain and Ireland=== Portrait Name From Until Relationship with predecessor align="center" align="center" align="center" align="center" align="center" align="center" ==References== * *
title: House of Stuart
